data.title: Barcelona vs. Real Madrid: Titles Won Comparison
meta_keywords: Barcelona Real Madrid comparison soccer titles won tournaments
data.meta_description: Who won the most tournaments, Real Madrid or Barcelona (both from Spain)? Here you have the details, head to head, of international and domestic titles won by each of these teams.
data.text:
Who won the most tournaments, Real Madrid or Barcelona (both from Spain)? Here you have the details, head to head, of international and domestic titles won by each of these teams.

At international level, Real Madrid won 11 titles more than Barcelona, 31 against 20.

When you consider domestic leagues, tournaments and cups, Barcelona surpasses Real Madrid in titles won 77 to 71.

Of course, these numbers only talk about the amount of titles won but they don't take into consideration the value or the relevance of each tournament.
